name: How To Send A Kid Anthrax - A Dan Kuroto Dating Simulator
name_original: How To Send A Kid Anthrax - A Dan Kuroto Dating Simulator
description: If you're a big fan of the "I can fix him" genre of men, you will love "How To Send A Kid Anthrax - A Dan Kuroto Dating Simulator" ! amia productions' debut video game is a hit with anyone who sees a therapist at least once a week!
